SEARCH
Package hms.user.model

Class Account

Object
Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
IModel
public class Account extends Object implements IModel
Represents an account in the system. Cannot be instantiated form outside the package.

  • Field Details

    • id

      String id
      The id of the account. This acts as the id for the user.

    • password

      String password
      The password of the account.

    • isActive

      boolean isActive
      The status of the account.

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      Account()
      Default constructor for Account class. Used for hydration.

    • Account

      Account(String id)
      Constructor for Account class. Generates a new account with the provided id. Password is set to default value of "password".
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the account.

    • authenticate

      public boolean authenticate(String password)
      Check if input password matches Account's set password
      Parameters:
      password - The input password
      Returns:
      true if matches with Account's password, false otherwise

    • hydrate

      public void hydrate(HashMap<String,String> data)
      Description copied from interface: IModel
      Populates the current instance of the model with data from the provided HashMap.

      The keys in the HashMap should match with the ones used in the serialize method.

      Models containing nested models should call the hydrate method of the nested model instead of directly setting the value or calling the constructor.

      Specified by:
      hydrate in interface IModel
      Parameters:
      data - A HashMap containing the data to hydrate the model with.

    • serialize

      public HashMap<String,String> serialize()
      Description copied from interface: IModel
      Serializes the model into a HashMap containing the data of the model.

      The keys in the HashMap will be the ones used in the hydrate method and nowhere else.

      Models containing nested models should call the serialize method of the nested model instead of reconstructing the key-value pairs by themselves.

      Specified by:
      serialize in interface IModel
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing the serialized data of the model.
